knownrelatives: Diana (wife), Zuras (son, deceased), Cybele (daughter-in-law), Azura (aka Thena, granddaughter), Alars (aka Mentor, son), Sui-San (daughter-in-law, deceased), Eros (aka Starfox, grandson), Thanos (grandson)
powers: Exponential augmentation of the cosmic  life force common to the race of super-humans known as the Eternals.
